channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- New User Approve
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- New User Approve

item.title: CVE-2022-1625|2024-08-03T00:10:03.782Z -- unknown -- new%20user%20approve
item.description: The New User Approve WordPress plugin before 2.4 does not have CSRF check in place when updating its settings and adding invitation codes, which could allow attackers to add invitation codes (for bypassing the provided restrictions) and to change plugin settings by tricking admin users into visiting specially crafted websites.
